speaker: PISTOL
text: Yield, cur.

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: Je pense que vous êtes le gentilhomme

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: de bonne qualité.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Qualtitie calmie custure me. Art thou a gentleman?

speaker: PISTOL
text: What is thy name? Discuss.

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: Ô Seigneur Dieu!

speaker: PISTOL
text: O, Seigneur Dew should be a gentleman. Perpend

speaker: PISTOL
text: my words, O Seigneur Dew, and mark: O

speaker: PISTOL
text: Seigneur Dew, thou diest on point of fox, except, O

speaker: PISTOL
text: Seigneur, thou do give to me egregious ransom.

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: Ô, prenez miséricorde! Ayez pitié de

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: moi!

speaker: PISTOL
text: Moy shall not serve. I will have forty moys, or

speaker: PISTOL
text: I will fetch thy rim out at thy throat in drops of

speaker: PISTOL
text: crimson blood.

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: Est-il impossible d’échapper la force

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: de ton bras?

speaker: PISTOL
text: Brass, cur? Thou damned and luxurious

speaker: PISTOL
text: mountain goat, offer’st me brass?

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: Ô, pardonnez-moi!

speaker: PISTOL
text: Say’st thou me so? Is that a ton of moys?—

speaker: PISTOL
text: Come hither, boy. Ask me this slave in French what

speaker: PISTOL
text: is his name.

speaker: BOY
text: Écoutez. Comment êtes-vous appelé?

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: Monsieur le Fer.

speaker: BOY
text: He says his name is Master Fer.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Master Fer. I’ll fer him, and firk him, and ferret

speaker: PISTOL
text: him. Discuss the same in French unto him.

speaker: BOY
text: I do not know the French for “fer,” and “ferret,”

speaker: BOY
text: and “firk.”

speaker: PISTOL
text: Bid him prepare, for I will cut his throat.

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: Que dit-il, monsieur?

speaker: BOY
text: Il me commande à vous dire que vous faites vous

speaker: BOY
text: prêt, car ce soldat ici est disposé tout à cette heure de

speaker: BOY
text: couper votre gorge.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Owy, cuppele gorge, permafoy, peasant, unless

speaker: PISTOL
text: thou give me crowns, brave crowns, or mangled

speaker: PISTOL
text: shalt thou be by this my sword.

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: Ô, je vous supplie, pour l’amour de

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: Dieu, me pardonner. Je suis le gentilhomme de bonne

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: maison. Gardez ma vie, et je vous donnerai deux

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: cents écus.

speaker: PISTOL
text: What are his words?

speaker: BOY
text: He prays you to save his life. He is a gentleman of a

speaker: BOY
text: good house, and for his ransom he will give you two

speaker: BOY
text: hundred crowns.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Tell him my fury shall abate, and I the crowns

speaker: PISTOL
text: will take.

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: Petit monsieur, que dit-il?

speaker: BOY
text: Encore qu’il est contre son jurement de pardonner

speaker: BOY
text: aucun prisonnier; néanmoins, pour les écus que vous

speaker: BOY
text: lui avez promis, il est content à vous donner la liberté,

speaker: BOY
text: le franchisement.

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: Sur mes genoux je vous donne mille

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: remercîments, et je m’estime heureux que j’ai tombé

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: entre les mains d’un chevalier, je pense, le plus brave,

speaker:
FRENCH
               
              SOLDIER
text: vaillant, et très distingué seigneur d’Angleterre.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Expound unto me, boy.

speaker: BOY
text: He gives you upon his knees a thousand thanks,

speaker: BOY
text: and he esteems himself happy that he hath fall’n

speaker: BOY
text: into the hands of one, as he thinks, the most

speaker: BOY
text: brave, valorous, and thrice-worthy seigneur of

speaker: BOY
text: England.

speaker: PISTOL
text: As I suck blood, I will some mercy show.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Follow me.

speaker: BOY
text: Suivez-vous le grand capitaine.

speaker: BOY
text: I did never know so full a voice issue from so empty

speaker: BOY
text: a heart. But the saying is true: “The empty vessel

speaker: BOY
text: makes the greatest sound.” Bardolph and Nym had

speaker: BOY
text: ten times more valor than this roaring devil i’ th’ old

speaker: BOY
text: play, that everyone may pare his nails with a wooden

speaker: BOY
text: dagger, and they are both hanged, and so would

speaker: BOY
text: this be if he durst steal anything adventurously. I

speaker: BOY
text: must stay with the lackeys with the luggage of our

speaker: BOY
text: camp. The French might have a good prey of us if he

speaker: BOY
text: knew of it, for there is none to guard it but boys.
